name: Theresa P
text: AWESOME pizza, great atmosphere, very clean, owner was very polite and friendly, and I loved the bar seating right along the "assembly line".  I got to watch two more pizzas being made to order as I savored my own personal pizza.  From the …More

name: Austin Bennett
text: We noticed this place because of its interesting name. We loved everything, especially the nice lady who took our order. It's tasty, cozy and has very fitting music for the place's style. Sadly, we are far from here, in Utah, but we would definitely come back again. Highly recommend!!

name: shari sandberg
text: I ordered the earthbound pizza. This is more vegetarian and I'm not even a vegetarian. It was amazingly delicious! It was full of flavor and everything just popped in your miuth.  It was a total explosion of flavor. The  breadsticks with …More

name: Virginia Violette
text: Service was excellent. Very cordial. Made a custom pizza that was reasonably priced and delicious. Convenient location close to hotels.

name: Daisy Thomson
text: We have found our new pizza place. We typically are Pizza hut go-ers, but found Nick and Willey's. The staff is friendly, the place is clean and the pizza is amazing. The variety of toppings is a plus and the fact that the onions are red, not white!

name: Cormac Sookram
text: Scammed my Pregnant wife on her first day in Grand Junction by herself starting a new job tomorrow. She ordered 2 slices of plain cheese with a drink which is ~6-7$ and they charge her $14. She walks away looks at the menu which shows the 2 …More

name: Topher Merriman
text: Had issues ordering online through slice, but the local shop itself was fine. No crumble topping on apple crumble, but the over all experience was good. I give it an over all 3, but it's a 4 for grand junction.

name: Trevor N
text: Awesome food and very clean. I love the fresh ingredients and the variety. A little pricey, but not prohibitive. Also like that you can come in and pick up a pizza to take home and bake later.

name: Cassie Wallace
text: Great place to get great pizza! Their gluten-free crust is the best I've ever had! Their staff is friendly and GF knowledgeable. There was a (not GF related) mix up with our order. They went above and beyond to make it right. My family will be back for sure!

name: Patrick Hayes
text: I go there once a week without fail. Ed and his staff are the best. Get the Agian!

name: Mike Haaff
text: nice little place, and the girl working monday night (5-16-16) was really sweet. pizza was acceptable and good, with fresh toppings, but not the best overall id ever had. id certainly order it again if i was in the area.

name: RMK
text: They have the best pizza in town! Seriously! More pricey than you'd usually spend on pizza, but worth it.

name: Bernadette M. Martinez
text: It took forever for our food to come out; don't plan on here for a quick bite. Friendly people and good food. I'd go again if I were in the area.

name: Mark Williams
text: I loved the pizza! I had the Magellan, as I love garlic, and I was not disappointed! Fresh ingredients, hand tossed crust, fast and friendly service.

name: Monica Brindisi
text: Best fresh pizza in town, gourmet style and the nicest customer service you can find there.  I'd highly recommend it to anyone local or traveling through.

name: Heather Lindsey
text: Great food and staff. Best pizza in town. I highly recommend.

name: Monica Brindisi
text: Awesome customer service and wonderful fresh pizza more gourmet style, not like pizza hut or anything like that.  Would highly recommend anyone there.

name: Wes Parker
text: Great place great pizza. Made it from scratch and gave my girls some Pizza dough to play with while we waited. Recommended as best pizza in town n I must say I haven't found better

name: andy feuerborn
text: Working out of town. This place was friendly , great food. Great service. Had the calzone will be nack to try more. The calzone and wings were great and filling.

name: Eric Los
text: Pizza is usually good but the lady took our money and went right back to food prep. No sanitation. No gloves nothing

name: KayDEEPerceptions
text: Had a wonderful expirience. Was hesitant to go in because it was in a strip mall and you never know what your walking into, but man are we glad we took the chance and went in, we really enjoyed our food. The owner and his wife were just …More

name: Ian G
text: This is my go to place for some good pizza.  They deliver, they have take-n-bake, and they will also bake it for you.  It beats any other place of its kind.

name: Jeromy Ozaeta
text: They get my order correct and will cook it if asked. Have always had good experiences with this restaurant and would easily recommend

name: Lauren Pysher
text: Amazing pizza, I love the Canadian chicken club (I think that's what it's called). Super friendly and fast workers.

name: Marcus Zabokrtsky
text: Great pizza... clean establishment and great service!

name: Jessica Wolf
text: To bad they can't get your order right 3 times 3 mess ups. Rude lady at counter won't waste my time

name: Johnathan Walsh
text: Good pizza, decent pricing, fairly quick service, and friendly staff. Would recommend and return if I find myself in the area again

name: Holly Percival
text: Food is fantastic! The company supports the local youth in anyway possible. Thank you for helping the next generation of leaders.

name: Tim Knippenberg
text: It's good, maybe a tad doughy for me but toppings were generous and staff was nice.  I would go back.

name: Dave Orton
text: Great pizza.  Good people

name: Marcie King
text: Good food, nice place to eat!

name: Sarah Walker Judson
text: One of our fav pizza joints. Was sad to see the location near our home close but happy to chance upon one while on a road trip.

name: yvonne castel
text: Familly dinner in there. Generous pizzas and nice staff ! I recommand.

name: Michael Orlando
text: I always get pizza here when ordering for party or celebration. I have never been disappointed.

name: Jake Lloyd
text: Good pizza and sandwiches, may be a bit of a wait.

name: Devon Kloehn
text: Nice little local pizza restaurant friendly staff

name: Tyler Malnerich
text: Good lil pizza joint.

name: David Maxwell
text: The food is great but the manager is a dick!

name: Joseph Christensen
text: Your number is wrong

name: Lora Teare
text: Great food, friendly staff

name: Jim Brunswick
text: Great pizza and friendly people!!

name: PT
text: Not many visits

name: pedro garcia
text: garbage pizza, cardboard, cold and slimy wife and kids got sick went to urgent care with food poisoning

name: Jim Brunswick Re/Max 4000, Inc
text: Best pizza in town and great people!!!

name: James Smith
text: Totally awesome staff and amazing pies

name: Rebecca Flad
text: When the manager decides to make her husbands pizza before the customers there is a problem. Especially considering he got there 5+ minutes AFTER WE PLACED OUR ORDER! Rude and horrible customer service.

name: Anthony Hudson
text: Nice place for lunch

name: Dan Barker
text: Love the pizza
